skins.selfIntroduction: Because ruination befell my homeland, I was returned to nothingness before I was born. As I am now, I am but an illusion, a manifestation of an ideal. But as long as you continue to lead my way, I shall in return clear all obstacles standing before yours.
skins.acquisition: It is an honor to meet you at last - my prophet, my leader. I am Saint Louis, brought to your side by God's will. As long as it is justice that guides your hand, then this humble spear shall be yours to wield.
skins.login: Bonjour, Commander. Please instruct me, what should we do next?
skins.details: Commander, have you come here to offer your prayers to God?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, your time should not be squandered here. Leave the chores to me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If there are any disputes within our ranks, allow me to handle the arbitration. That is my specialty.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Just winning the battle alone is enough to satisfy me, but you, Commander, ought to look far beyond that.
skins.secretaryTouch: I fight so that there may be peace. That is the single role that I can play.

skins.shipDescription: With all due respect, Commander, this finery and this throne are not fit for one such as myself. Despite the hallowed name I have inherited, I am nothing more than a warrior. ―However, if such an arrangement pleases you, then I shall hold my objections.
skins.acquisition: With all due respect, Commander, this finery and this throne are not fit for one such as myself. Despite the hallowed name I have inherited, I am nothing more than a warrior. ―However, if such an arrangement pleases you, then I shall hold my objections.
skins.login: Commander, making me sit up here waiting for you by myself is a tribulation in its own right.
skins.details: I have no serious objections to sitting up here, but... there is one thing I cannot figure out. Are you perhaps deriving pleasure from seeing me up here like this?
skins.secretaryIdle1: So I've managed to capture your gaze? Your eyes are... Nevermind, it doesn't bother me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: My arbitration is needed? ...Very well, please excuse me for a moment. I will make sure to hear them out.
skins.secretaryIdle3: As the one guiding this fleet forward... Commander, you are the one best suited to this throne.
skins.secretaryTouch: My weapon is always within reach. Should you will it, I am ready to sortie at any time.
